title: Pairing a san-serif text face with Dax?
content:
I have an existing ID that Im working with. Dax has been used primarily for everything, the wordmark portion of the logo is also set in Dax.   
Im looking for sugestions for a text face.   
I plan to use Dax for titling and such.   
   
Any suggestions?
author: Hildebrant

comments.content:
Have a look over [this thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013161751/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/19562.html), where people proposed all kinds of alternatives to dax.   
   
If you want a readable text face, [Gerard Ungers stuff](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013161751/http:/www.gerardunger.com/), especially Vesta, is amazingly readable for sans faces.
